x-enum-comments.InitiatorTypeBNPL: buy now pay later BNPL transactions

x-enum-comments.TransactionTypeCredit: credit means - income - when money is gained or received into an account
x-enum-comments.TransactionTypeDebit: debit means - outcome - when money is lost, spent, or withdrawn from an account

price.description: Price of the product that was uploaded

quantity.description: Quantity of the product that was uploaded

uploaded_to.description: Place where the product was uploaded to
